statements: SELECT * FROM WasteMaterialsInventory WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM WasteMaterialsInventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT id, material_name, entry_timestamp FROM WasteMaterialsInventory ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteMaterialsInventory WHERE material_name LIKE '%paper%';
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM WasteMaterialsInventory GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT id, material_name, quantity, supplier_id, entry_timestamp FROM WasteMaterialsInventory ORDER BY material_name ASC, entry_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM WasteMaterialsInventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM WasteMaterialsInventory GROUP BY material_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT id, material_name, quantity, supplier_id, entry_timestamp FROM WasteMaterialsInventory WHERE supplier_id = 5 ORDER BY entry_timestamp ASC
SELECT id, material_name, quantity FROM WasteMaterialsInventory WHERE material_name LIKE '%plastic%' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM WasteMaterials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM WasteMaterials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT material_name, entry_timestamp FROM WasteMaterials ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM SupplyChainOptimization WHERE shipment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_name, quantity, entry_timestamp FROM WasteMaterials WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY entry_timestamp ASC;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM WasteMaterials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainOptimization WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM SupplyChainOptimization ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT material_name, quantity, entry_timestamp FROM WasteMaterials WHERE material_name LIKE 'Plastic%' ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT material_name, quantity, shipment_date FROM WasteMaterials JOIN SupplyChainOptimization USING (material_id) ORDER BY shipment_date DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM waste_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM waste_materials;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT material_name, quantity, entry_date FROM waste_materials ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM waste_materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT t.transaction_id, m.material_name, s.supplier_name, t.quantity FROM transactions t JOIN waste_materials m ON t.material_id = m.material_id JOIN suppliers s ON t.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE t.quantity > 100;
SELECT material_name, quantity, DATE(entry_date) AS entry_date FROM waste_materials ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM waste_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT entry_timestamp, quantity FROM entry_logs WHERE entry_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM material_categories ORDER BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM waste_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM waste_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT category_name, description FROM material_categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM facilities ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT log_id, material_name, quantity, entry_type FROM entry_logs JOIN waste_materials ON entry_logs.material_id = waste_materials.material_id WHERE entry_type = 'outgoing';
SELECT * FROM waste_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM waste_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM waste_materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM material_suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT material_id, material_type, entry_timestamp FROM waste_materials WHERE entry_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY entry_timestamp ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity FROM waste_materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_type ASC
SELECT material_name, entry_timestamp FROM waste_materials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' AND entry_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY entry_timestamp DESC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number, email FROM material_suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%' ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT * FROM material_inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY quantity DESC

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.quantity, t.transaction_type, h.action_type FROM material_transactions t JOIN inventory_history h ON t.transaction_id = h.transaction_id WHERE t.quantity > 10 AND h.history_timestamp > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY h.history_timestamp ASC
